website_summaries.verdict: These night-lights get dimmer as the sun rises and brighter as it sets. A bargain for 6 lights at this price.
pros: Users rave about the soft white light that is bright enough to see in the dark but not so bright as to hurt your eyes
Designed to maximize use of outlets
Like most LED products, this is cheap to run
We love the dimming feature and how it stays cool
cons: Darkness sensor loses sensitivity over time
There’s no way to turn them off

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: I'm THRILLED with these. One on each end of our ranch layout home gives us plenty of light at night to be able to navigate without turning lights on. I feel like these look like expensive night lights, starting off dim and getting brighter as it gets darker out. I have no complaints. They are slim to the wall so my 1 1/2 year old doesn't notice there is something to pull out and they stay securely in the wall (I had no issues with them in my US outlet) these are honestly one of my best Amazon finds and I've recommended them to many friends. If my review was helpful to you please let me know! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: S. BarryTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Bright light not worth the safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these at least four stars before today. They are bright and work well as far as when they come on and go off. Earlier this evening I heard a pop and went to investigate. I found the cover side under the dining room table - six feet from the outlet - and the actual plug side is blackened as well. Not sure what happened to make it literally blow its top all of a sudden, but I quickly unplugged and threw away the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Warm lights give the perfect glow
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeee. Simple design without being too obnoxious or distracting from the aesthetics of the interior of the house. Doesn't take too much space and can use the other outlet at the same time. I bought the yellow (warm) lights instead of the white ones, and it's a perfect glow without being too harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best LED lights to light up your homes interior.
customer_reviews.text: Super bright, works well in hallways, kitchens, bathrooms and anyplace you need additional light at night. Off-set plug prongs still allow you to utilize the other socket. Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sycees LED Lights Do Exactly What They Advertise
customer_reviews.text: Love these Sycees LED lights. Opened and plugged into outlet straight from the box. Photosensitive so they light up in increments according to the ambient light in the room. Great for saving on the electric bill because they're not always on, plus they're LEDs. Have had these lights plugged in for 6 months now & no problems. We use them in the hallway to the guest bathroom, in the kitchen, & in the children's room. Pics included - might not show it but they emit a light bright enough to walk in the dark, but not so bright as to wake someone using one as a nightlight. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: MissKrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good night light to keep you from stumbling in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from these lights when I ordered them. Most night lights are either too dark, too bright or give off a weird glow. I tested one of these in my bathroom, turned off the light and it lit up instantly. The light was soft and diffused. Not too bright and not to dark. I tried them out in the garage, kitchen and hallway and they worked out perfect. I wouldn't use these in a bedroom as the light might be too bright and keep you up. They are good to use if you need to light a path or find your way around in the middle of the night without turning on lamps
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: how to make 'em less bright...
customer_reviews.text: hey these are great. little too bright for some locations but perfect for others. if you already have: if you are careful you can pop off the front cover (on the side, between the translucent section of plastic and the solid plastic section with the plug) and access the leds. you can then cover 2 of the leds with a spot of black tape or otherwise disable the leds to make it less bright. (you are tesoonsuble for your own actions, of course. do this at your own risk and all that other regretable legal stuff we have to throw in these days). : )
customer_reviews.author: markm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little night lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect little night lights. I love the warm glow of the light and the fact that they are bright enough to see the bathroom in the middle of the night but not too bright that it keeps you awake if it shines in your bedroom. They are very sensitive to the light and will start to turn on if it's beginning to get dark, but aren't always staying on in a dimly lit room. They are also just the right size of one plug so they don't hang over and block the other side of the outlet. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: carehunny

customer_reviews.title: Best nightlight!
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/1/20: These lights are still going strong after about three years 2017 review: I really only needed one nightlight for our powder room. I decided to buy a six pack of these. Now, I wish I went with the eight pack. The warm white color gives a nice glow anywhere you have an outlet. They have a nice feature that allows them to dim a bit depending on the ambient light They also come on with a quick dim up that make it feel like a high end product.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: cheap and work great, offset plugs is very useful
customer_reviews.text: These lights are cheap and work great. Unlike some other cheap night-lights, the plugs on the back are offset so the light doesn't block both outlets. There is no sensitivity adjustment, but it works well enough in our house. No motion sensor like expensive night-lights have. We have motion-sensor lights in our bedrooms so they are dark when we are trying to sleep; these cheap lights in other rooms. 4 stars for functionality plus one extra star for the price.
customer_reviews.author: l2Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: These suck. An LED night light that no longer works after 6 months! (And you can't replace the LED). And an expensive. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed great at first glance, not even 3 months later every single night light one by one has stopped working, first they flicker and only come on when I stand in front of them or put my hand over it and then they stopped working completely. Out of all of them there is only 2 working intermittently. very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing! They adjust to the lighting and when it's dark they are very bright. Perfect if you want a lot of light in an area!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Attwood

customer_reviews.title: No go for me
customer_reviews.text: Not UL rated! Not as bright as I expected. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: ahiker4u

customer_reviews.title: Too dim, doesn't light till it's totally black in the room
customer_reviews.text: Worthless! Won't turn on unless it is pitch black. Then there is only a dim light no better than the moonlight coming in the window. Wouldn't light my bathroom enough to keep from tripping over the cat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Selzler

customer_reviews.title: Get warm light if you think it'll be too bright, that are also easier on the eyes at night
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure people complaining about it being too bright are using daylight version. If you get Warm Light they are a very gentle color and brightness. Daylight brightness used in many lights is well known to be brighter as well as more "electrifying" so it will actually wake you up a little bit if you are walking around at night. If you want an example... if you're phone has a "night mode" or "blue light filter" try using that at night. You will see your phone go from a clear white to a warm white. This is easier on your eyes. Very happy with the warm light version of these.
customer_reviews.author: Neal121

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention Since Beer in a Can
customer_reviews.text: These nightlights use only half a watt, so I have them in every room of my house, and in the garage as well! I put four of them on a power strip for my bathroom so I don't have to turn on that light during the night. These are a good help to make a house safe for a senior.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed nightlights around the house, and this was the best value for the amount you get. I put them into the outlets I needed them to be in, and I loved them so much that I bought a second box of them that same night!! They work great, the light they give off is awesome. I will say that if you want a nightlight in your bedroom but don't like light in your room, these may be a bit too bright for you, unless you put them somewhere where the light won't be shining in your general direction too terribly. I'm actually currently considering buying a third box just so I have extras, lol! Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Usagi Chiba

customer_reviews.title: Get these they work great.
customer_reviews.text: We have one and every room, every hallway, and about three of them in the kitchen. One tip, I could give to parents is that if you can, put one in the hallway going towards the kitchen and bathroom. You will make a nice trial of lights. We got some heavy sleepers in my house , but my kids do get up to use the bathroom @ night. Just want to make it easier for them. These lights are a great gift for baby showers also, and it won’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Nel P

customer_reviews.title: Warm white sensors are too sensitive, causing annoying flickering
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the warm white night lights. I owned the cool white ones, same brand, and they worked flawlessly. Unfortunately, the light sensor for the warm white lights are calibrated differently, and as you'll see the video, it seems a little too sensitive. I think having the light in the same room as a TV might be causing this, but I'm not sure. The cool white ones in the same place never flickered. I tried putting some tape on the sensor to see if that would help, but it did not. If I can't figure out a fix, I'll have to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Lirot

customer_reviews.title: The photo sensor is extremely accurate
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect much from Chinese-made products. However, these lights have a couple of advantages: -The photo sensor is extremely accurate, and during daytime even when it's dark (cloudy days), they do not turn on. However, once the night falls they illuminate. -These lights use bullet-type low-intensity LED's at 4 corners, so the light is soft daylight and does not disturb your sleep yet provides just enough light to provide safety at night. The low-intensity bullet type LED's consume little power, so I might buy another set of these.
customer_reviews.author: JPN850R

customer_reviews.title: awesome night lights of the future
customer_reviews.text: replaced all my grandma style nightlights (with the old school light bulb) with these and so far they are great. Line your hallway with these and you don't even need to turn the overhead light on. Feels like being on a starship. They are probably too bright to use as a bedroom nightlight and the whitness is quite intense, but I read in other reviews that the warm color ones are better for that purpose. Also I will say that they are not sensitive, it has to be very dark for them to come on, but that is the point! You are not saving electricity if your night lights are on during the day......
customer_reviews.author: Schneid

customer_reviews.title: Get around at night. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and provide just enough light. Had a friend stay over and they didn't remember where the kitchen lights were but these provided just enough light to get a glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Useful, well built, VERY BRIGHT, night light.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviewers that say that these things are VERY bright. They really are. They are well constructed, while using only one socket on my outlet without hindering use of the other. A little duct tape over half of the light and it's the perfect nightlight for the guest bedrooms. With 6 lights in the box, I have one in each bathroom and some corridors as well to see things better at night. I would most definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar the Grouch

customer_reviews.title: Very bright for its size
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how bright they are. Use in the hallway. Also bathroom for late night nature calls when I don't want to turn on bathroom light. Have one in guest bathroom for when grandkids visit. Plan to take one when traveling so don't have to leave bathroom light on in motel. A little too bright for use in bedroom. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for stubbed toes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 6 pack. All worked fine right outta the box. Just plug 'em in. I and my wife, the compulsive/obsessive re-arranger, live in a lop-sided old farmhouse. In a fit of hysteria after a near-crippling encounter with some piece of useless decor that WAS NOT there when I went to bed, I ordered these and installed them immediately upon arrival. Yes, it has only been a couple of months, but I am much more confident about traversing our lovely old home in the dark and pain-free!
customer_reviews.author: C. Angier

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, ordered and none work!
customer_reviews.text: Order a second set, 4/4 lights don't work. Seems I only got lucky with the first ordered set! Won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Collier

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard?
customer_reviews.text: I found this outlet and plug like this. Our home is only a few years old. This is terrifying. Why did this do this? It was in my sons room.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Harper

customer_reviews.title: My mostly blind dog can find the dog door at night again!
customer_reviews.text: Great little LED night lights. My dog was recently diagnosed with diabetes (like a true 'Murican) and unfortunately lost most of his vision as well. He does pretty well around the house, but at night I could tell he struggled when trying to find the dog door. A pack of these fixed that right up, and unless his vision continues to decline, they're doing a great job at helping him find his way. They're much brighter than any other night lights we had around, though the others are all pretty old. But the light sensor does a seriously fantastic job at detecting the light levels and reacting to dim/brighten the lights appropriately. 10/10 would recommend. 11/10 would recommend with rice.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, they do not turn off, ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, they do not turn off, they stay on all the time even when the lights are on or its a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. The look great and offer a good amount of light without being overwhelming or too distracting. Although in my opinion, they can be a bit too bright for a bedroom if it’s in the wrong spot. No issues with the light sensors...they turn on and off when they should. If you’re looking for a light for your bathroom or closet, these may not be what you want since they’ll stay on constantly in a room with no sunlight. Only had them a couple months so can’t speak to the longevity, but I have had no issues at all, and am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the 'orangish' halo in the product picture fool you into not buying this excellent mini warm night light
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the picture showing an 'orangish' halo fool you into not buying this excellent mini light. The white color when lit is more like the other pictures below the main product pics above. I'd have purchased this long ago but didn't want the funny looking beige/orange edge. Then I found out it truly is a warm white, but still white and best of all, it comes in a compact offset plug square which truly takes up only one socket, unlike others where in order to plug a vacuum in you have to remove the existing nightlight. Bottom line, at under $3. apiece, these are a terrific buy and give off just the right amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: WSJ

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough for hallways
customer_reviews.text: These are great for hallways that are dark during the day. They are very bright, so you don't need to turn the light on to see where you're walking. Depends on what your needs are. You may have to make an internal adjustment to make them more sensitive to light. I did and it made a difference. They were staying on during the day in rooms without bright light. Customer service responded immediately to this problem and suggested I open them up and cut the black rubber sleeve located in the center. This allowed more light to get to the sensor. Now they're off most of the day in lower lit rooms.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: I really like this invention. Saves on electricity and gives nightlights a modern appearance. It truly does detect darkness properly. A con would be that I don't find it bright enough. Sometimes when the day is only starting to get dark the nightlight would be half lit since the sky is not dark enough. Even though the light detects that it isn't dark enough, the human eye, at least mine, thinks otherwise. Especially for those with bad vision, it would be better to have a brighter version even when it is not fully dark yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: i guess.
customer_reviews.text: these are cool, and i like that they're automatic. what i don't like, is the color temperature. they're "pure white". i was hoping that they'd be a "warm" white. i also wish that they had a maximum brightness setting, though i've discovered that based on how much light the sensor sees, the brightness adjusts by itself. but when its complete darkness, they shine at full brightness and its almost distracting, particularly if you have a relatively small bedroom with one of these in a corner or something. they work great for larger, more open areas like living rooms and kitchens (hallways included). the color temperature is probably my biggest woe with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: eilleilleT

customer_reviews.title: Color has changed, now more "yellowish white" than "daylight white"
customer_reviews.text: First set of these was great, beautiful daylight white light color as described... so a few months later I bought a second set of this same item from the same seller, but now they are manufactured with more of an ugly yellowish color than white, certainly not "daylight white" as described. Originals were great, these are not. Also note that the little plastic piece that covers the center can come loose and may be a choking hazard for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.  3 of 6 Lights did not function out of the box
customer_reviews.text: 1st light I plugged in emitted such a small amount of light it was useless for babies room and diaper changes. Tried 2 and finally 3 lights in the same room till I decided to go back to our old led night light. Worst of all the other 3 lights in the package didn't work right out of the box. 2 flickered on and off in a completely dark room and the 3rd one would turn on for 5 seconds then turn off. I even tested the lights per the companies instructions and still had the same trouble. This item is terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Health Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good night lights
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome and illuminate areas very well. I hardly ever have an issue where they don’t come on when there isn’t enough light nearby. They are very bright so not sure this is something you’d want in your bedroom because it could probably disrupt your ability to fall asleep. Best used for hallways and other parts of the home where you may want to have some light without having to turn on lights or in a dark bathroom so you can see before turning on a light.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not much light comes from these lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the incandescent 4-watt night lights I use around the house. They fit well, are small in size which means the item does not block the other receptacle and the photo sensor works well. However, it throws of only a fraction of the light that I'm used to. If you want to light a hallway at night, they are certainly efficient, but with such a small light output, they are not satisfactory. I would love these if they came in a higher wattage for brighter light.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Semenick

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered these. As soon as I received them, I tested all 6 in my windowless bathroom and each one worked perfectly. Also, they allow access to the second outlet, which was a critical feature for me. I ordered the warm white because that's my preference in my traditional home. They look great and provide just the right amount of light in the bathroom at night. Because my bathroom has no window, the night light stays on all the time except when the main ceiling light is on. Can't speak to longevity, but so far I love them!
customer_reviews.author: tbear

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Ive purchased 2 boxes of these in the last month. I purchased the first box because we moved into a new one story home and I needed lights for my dog to see at night down our long hallway. After about a month of living in the new house, I realized he needed more light so I purchased another box. These are a God send for my half blind senior dog. I believe the colors come in warm white or bright white and I purchased warm white and they light up everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Racquelle

customer_reviews.title: Modern functional nightlight. Sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: I hadn’t bought a night light for years. They were the old kind with a bulb. These are light years ahead in style and function. Just plug in. The light is a good level at night to enter a dark bathroom or walk down the hall and see where you are going. The on at dark off at daylight works perfectly. I can’t speak to their length of life, but it should be much better than the old clunky lights. Very nice design. Very sleek and modern appearance. I’m very pleased. Reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: yajaru

customer_reviews.title: Just bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Had a baby not too long ago and needed nightlights so that we would not die trying to make bottles in the dark or have to turn on lights. These have been awesome. They aren’t too bright but they let you see enough so that you can manage. We have them in our bathroom, hallway, kitchen counter, and in the living room. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: We bought the yellowish colored ones and I'm glad we did. We wanted to put some of these around the house so that we would stop tripping over shoes and walking into bedposts in the middle of the night. My wife's idea was to accidently shine her iPhone flashlight directly into my eyes each time she had to make a 2 a.m. bathroom run, but somehow that wasn't working for me, so we gave this a try. For me they're a little bright, and for my wife not bright enough, so I guess they're just right when I think about it.
customer_reviews.author: gogo

customer_reviews.title: Great little night lights!
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to replace older, power hungry night lights. Wasn't sure what to expect being fairly cheap. Having installed them and tested out I can say they have exceeded my expectations! They're well built, bright and put out lights in all directions. They work great for giving you the light you need to make your way through a dark house. However, being bright I would suggest not putting them in your bedroom if light bothers you. I tested these on my wattage meter and they didn't register. The night lights we replaced read as using 8 watts. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chargeit

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Petite and Bright night light effectively light up to 2 feet in a darkened room. Depending on the dimness of the area, these activate when room light dims or artificial light 💡 or natural light is switched on. Included instructions help set up particular needs. The best thing about these is the size which only occupies a single Wall Outlet, leaving space for another plugged in device. Very efficient design and effective for the task.
customer_reviews.author: Automatic Drip Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Modern look, works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these little lights based off of the reviews I read. So happy about my purchase. I have one in almost every room in my house. Brightens up all the little dark corners. I wear glasses and when I wake up in the middle of the night it’s so hard to see. But these little lights help guide me along. They are bright enough to show you the space around but not too bright where they are annoying. They are also perfect size so they don’t block your entire outlet and look very modern.
customer_reviews.author: ASG108

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, affordable and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these are powered by the wall, while LED so have a much longer life than regular night lights. The light sensor has them brighten softly, so as the sun goes down they SLOWLY come on. So, with tiny bit of sunlight they'r like 50% on, but go to 100% when totally dark. The response is immediate too, so put your hand over it or turn a room light on/off and they respond within the second...there's no lag. I love them. My wife loves them. And I'm no longer tripping over sleeping dogs or computer chargers at night. My bare feet thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AdventureMK

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. This is the only review to read before buying
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Overall Im a little bit of a extremeist when it comes to writing reviews. In short these lights are exactly what you are looking for if the your in the market to buy a similar item of sorts. They product produces a very, very good amount of light, might be a bit bright for a night lite but perfect for ambiance, bathrooms, living rooms basement etc... -Good price. -light indicator works perfect. -doesn’t seem like it is made to break. Ive had the lights for a year and all still work fine. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Ethan A.

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good about these nightlights!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the motion detection night lights. These automatically turn on when it gets dark. We also have a pretty dark hallway, so that one stays on all the time. If you get up in the middle of the night you don't have to turn on a light, unless you want to, but who wants to turn on a bright light and kill your eyes. I have them placed in every room. I don't know about you, but I have stumbled, fell, and have stubbed toe's in a dark house. Besides you don't want to meet the Boogyman in the black of night do you???
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bright, warm light from these LED nightlights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a six pack of these nightlights after losing a few night lights to age, wear, kids etc. For the price, it's nice to get a multi pack so I can place them throughout the house. I get bright warm light from these LED nightlights and the sensors make it easy to stick these in a plug and never touch them again. I have a couple older (different model) nightlights that emit a cold, blue-white LED color - they are no where near as pleasing as these lights. I'll buy another pack soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtyeightthousandth

customer_reviews.title: Illuminating but not a soft light
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Strong rectangle of light. - Package of six prompted me to light several rooms/portions of the same room. - In most cases, turns off during the day or when the area is lit. - Motion detector works, but I'm unsure why that is an asset. Cons: - The light has more of a blue tinge than a softer yellow. I wouldn't put it in an infant's room. - One plug-in is somewhat blocked by a side table. Even though the lamp is turned on, the plug-in remains on.
customer_reviews.author: cpb

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: They make my house easy to navigate, turn on/off by themselves and don't use much energy at all. Get the warmer colored LEDs, the others are too bright. I particularly like having them in my bathroom when I go at night. I appreciate not having to turn on bright lights and wake completely up. They provide just enough light to illuminate an entire room with the least possible light. With that said they are too bright for a bedroom I would only use them in halls/kitchens/bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Have a couple of these plugged in for a couple of months now; working fine. They are quite bright for spotting them at a distance. They shed enough light perhaps 20' away to not trip on something. Yet they are not overly bright right up close. I put one over toilet in bath and it's like a bullseye over the tank! Gives enough light to get to toilet but not enough to wake you at night on a quick trip to the loo. I also like that they don't come on in the mid-afternoon or on a cloudy day.
customer_reviews.author: GeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Sensors work well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set of six to light hallways that become very dark at night. Turning on lights to make our way from room to room seemed too much energy for a few seconds in the darkness but there are objects and walls that seem to have moved when feeling our way without any light. These little plug-in sensor lights trun on when in real darkness, when they are really needed. We haven't had them long enough to know how long they'll last but for now, they are super!
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Sleek designed night light
customer_reviews.text: Dont hesitate to purchase these night lights. I was worried that they may be too dim, but the light output is just right. The amount of light also varies depending on how dark the room is. The design is vey sleek and there is plenty of clearance to use the adjacent receptical. But with confidence these are well designed. One note of caution the light sensor is glass, one was accidentally dropped and the glass broke. If this happens throw the entire light away. The exposed sensor is energized and you could get electrocuted. One improvement in my mind would be to make that small window from plastic instead of glass.
customer_reviews.author: 502PWRD

customer_reviews.title: awesome night lights!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over one year now after I bought my house. the house was so dark at night I couldn't see anything and found these and ordered them. they are perfect for middle of night run to bathroom or going to kitchen to get some water. they light the path just enough to see everything without blinding you and making you stay awake. I totally recommend these night lights. I plan on ordering more soon for a few spots in house that could use them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I like how they aren’t obtrusive. You can put them in a hallway and nobody will notice them unless the lights go out. They almost put out too much light for a bedroom, but that’s subjective. They really came in handy when our new baby arrived since we had to make nightly trips to the kitchen to heat up bottles. I haven’t used a nightlight since I was a kid, but I discovered the practical side. They’re for more than just keep the monsters at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Just a really useful light.
customer_reviews.text: I have these down in my finished basement and they make a world of difference. No more having your hands full and having to fumble for a light switch to avoid tripping on the stairs or wondering where the dogs are laying. They are not super bright, but certainly put out plenty of useable light to navigate by. For the price these are a terrific value. I can't yet speak to their longevity, but if you need some solid, functional night lights, these certainly won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: These automated night lights are perfect for us! We just bought a house and were sick of running into everything when we turned the lights off to go to bed. The design of these lights is very sleek and not easy to notice when they are off. They are sensitive to the light in the room, and they turn on automatically as soon as we turn the lights off. They do a great job of lighting up our walkways without being overbearingly bright.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as URPOWER or GE Ultra Bright Plug ins!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many of these and in my humble opinion, the URPOWER Brand is the better ones as they put out more light! However, if you want more light, definitely go with GE Ultra Bright Plug ins Brand as they put out a very 100 Lumens output and you never need a Battery, Just plug them in your sockets and they work much better than all of these unless you don't have plug ins which in my case I used these as well as the URPOWE ones in my closets!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: Definitely passes the ambient light sensor test (in both a good /bad way depending on how you look at it). I could be moving around it and the light that it emits would bounce of me, back to the sensor, and it will adjust the light. Don't know if there's such a thing as too sensitive, but it doesn't bother me. I deducted a star because I think it could be a little softer; it feels very bright white/almost blue and is not the most comfortable to look at during the night. I liked that they are low profile in terms of space used.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect size. Just the right amount of light. The light detection is accurate. We have a very big a very dark house. I put these in my halls, kitchen and bathroom so my kids can make their way around at night. If you are walking through the house with your flashlight they turn off as you approach and right back on after you pass. Other brands I’ve tried have stayed on during the day because the light was still too low to detect. These work perfectly so we aren’t wasting power during the day. Buy em right now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cool night lights. They appear to be very well made. They actually dim depending on how dark it is. They don't just click on or off like most night lights with sensors. I got the warm white because I didn't want blue light waking my brain up in the middle of the night. The color of the light is pretty good, much like a regular soft white light bulb. The pictures make it seem a little yellower than it is. I'd say they're a little brighter than I would like though. You can see things pretty clearly with this light nearby if your eyes are adjusted to the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Wordimont

customer_reviews.title: Great to light the way, won't protect your kids from dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Super bright but not blinding like the white ones. Great for potty training so my daughter can learn to go potty on her own in the middle of the night (she can't reach the light switches yet) - I say this in theory because she still likes to wake me up anyway because she claims that she needs me to protect her from the dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nightlight
customer_reviews.text: I have these all over my house! So far we are 18 months and still lighting up. Favorite feature: these don't interfere with anything else I've wanted to plug in next to or above/below these night lights. These light sensitive night lights remain dormant if you are in the room and have the lights on or have natural light illuminating the room. However, as night and dusk settle in these lights pop on and provide just enough light and coverage area to guide you to the light switch, down the hall, up the stairs or into the bathroom. They are also not so bright as to fully wake you up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Harty

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these night lights. We recently moved into a bigger home and wanted an efficient way to be able to move around at night without turning on the lights - we have found our answer! We've put these in as many places as one pack will allow and are planning on purchasing more. We've had no issue with the motion detection or brightness. We have people of all ages who visit our home (very young to very old) and all compliment the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Bright and White
customer_reviews.text: I like these little night lights. Light sensor to turn off and on. Good value with the 6-pack. Two (fairly major) complaints, however: quality of light is too blue/cool, and light is actually too bright as a night light. We've taken to putting dark (electrical or duct) tape around these so they aren't so offensive to eyes which are accustomed to the dark. Consequently, most are sitting in their box, unused. Update: After the last review, the company sent me an email and gave me a full refund. They do also offer a warmer light, which (I believe) was not an option when I ordered these. That's great customer service! I've given these an extra star as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Jame Swit

customer_reviews.title: Small but very useful!
customer_reviews.text: We installed these all over in our kitchen, once the main lights are off, these light up so well, making a water run in the middle of the night so much easy. They look awesome too. I installed a spare single one in the middle of the garage and it lights up the whole garage in the dark not needing to turn any lights on when doing a quick visit to the garage. Our little boy says they look like a bunch of Teslas in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lights, but maybe a bit too bright for regular use.
customer_reviews.text: Plusses: bright, white light; very inexpensive; all the lights in my package work; non-polarized plugs mean I can insert them up or down, in either slot of an outlet. Minusses: even in the daytime, with the blinds open, some of these think it's dark enough to turn on; they are a bit too bright for all-night usage (when I wake up in the night, the entire room seems too bright from one of these) - I'm going to look for some like this, but with motion-sensing. If your work requires lots of travel, and living out of a suitcase, throw one of these in your bag, and use it in your motel room.
customer_reviews.author: Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well, good lighting
customer_reviews.text: All of these units are still functioning after 2-1/2 years. I use them for nighttime navigating, and they work well. I don't need to turn on any lights in my small bathroom during a late-night visit; one of these units provides enough light all by itself. I can't definitively say they're energy efficient, but they are LEDs and they only run when it's dark, so the logical assumption is that they're efficient. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur L. Ranney

customer_reviews.title: A little over two years and they are toast.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set of six and when they were new they worked well. Over time they started getting dimmer and eventually they're useless as night lights. They no longer illuminate the way a night light should. Figure they'll last about as long as an old school incandecent bulb in a night light fixture, but without the bulk. We expected them to last a really long time so I'm not sure I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: ? with everything

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: We had an old nightlight in the bathroom, that had a sensor and would only come on at night (or in darkness), but it used an incandescent bulb that needed to be replaced occasionally. These nightlights put out just the right amount of light (the warm white version) without being too bright. Ignore the yellow-orange color in the picture - they are white when off and don't look like pumpkins. If they last as long as LED's should, they will be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Book

customer_reviews.title: Can you love a nightlight?  It just works without blinding you, what's not to love about that?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to used for travel and in my guest bathroom. I bough 6 of them and gave a couple to my parents to use as well. I bought the WARM WHITE and they are much warmer white than other LED nightlights I have purchased in the past. They are photo/light sensing, hence they will stay on if there is not sufficient light in the room. I use them in a bathroom where there is a window. They also worked well in a hotel bathroom when traveling and they are small and one-piece, so they fit easily in a toiletry bag and won't come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for some extra light in walkways
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about these after reading some reviews but we have had them in place for a couple of months now and I could not be more satisfied! They all work just fine, and they give off the perfect amount of light for what we needed. They are not super bright which is great for us. We were looking for something to help guide the way and shed a small amount of white light on the floor for when we are walking through the house in the middle of the night. I couldn’t ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent night lights!
customer_reviews.text: These solved all our "can't see in the dark" problems at night. They are light sensitive and turn off automatically. You just plug them in and voila! They have offset plugs, too, so they do not block access to the other plugins. I read where, even if they were on 24/7, they only would cost 31 cents per year. We have installed them in several rooms in our house, and they are worth their weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Really handy!
customer_reviews.text: I based my purchase off of existing reviews, and was not disappointed at all! We have them everywhere in the house at this point. Our kids used to wake each other up by turning on overhead lights to navigate bathroom visits, etc., but now can easily see without having to do that. I love that I never have to turn them off or on, and that they use so little energy. So grateful I stumbled onto these!
customer_reviews.author: H&J Mads

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: We built a new house and moved in 12/2018. I love these lights and the warm glow they give off. I'm a 50 year old baby about having night lights everywhere - so deal with it! (LOL). They are cool to the touch and I have them in the hall ways, kitchen, living and (ALL OVER THE HOUSE!) They have nice clean lines and provide the right amount of light during the night. I also like that they don't stick out too far from the outlet! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match pictures
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. Pix show offset plug in rear allowing full use of a dual receptacle. I received units with centered plug. Seller has not responded to my complaint. Credit only available by shipping them back to China.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Price

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with these. Good price, and they don’t look tacky. At first, I doubted that they would be bright enough to keep me from running into things at night, but once your eyes adjust, they’re the perfect brightness. I put one in my bathroom and one on the path to the bathroom and they keep me from having to turn on any lights when I have to use the bathroom at night. Just don’t put them too close to your bed or they might keep you up :)
customer_reviews.author: Melanie R

customer_reviews.title: Just right amount of light
customer_reviews.text: I never noticed my night lights had been failing for a long time, then suddenly it dawned on me the house was completely dark. I read the reviews and chose this item. I didn’t think I would use the entire pack but the price was good. I am delighted at the look and feel they bring to the rooms. Not too bright and not too dark. I put two in the living room, one in kitchen, one in dining, and one in a bedroom. It is easy to navigate around the house without turning on overhead lights. Very nice purchase. Even if they don’t last for many years this is a great product to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME Did I tell you how AWESOME these things are? Works GREAT, Plug in and forget it. So much better then the night lights with the 7W bulbs because they get hot & you forget to turn them off. I think these are safer and they're cool to the touch, auto on and off. Just the right amount of light, It will not hurt your eyes even when you look right at it,
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: So durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 2 years now and it's still works like new. I love it so much that I bought some for my parents so that they don't have any trouble when getting up at night. It's so easy to use and so small that you will still be able to use the other outlet. It looks nice and modern and produces lots of light fur such a small item. On a side note Avengers Endgame is the best movie ever! I will definitely be buying this product again for friends and family.. Have to take care of them, the way they took care of me.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Nerd

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I read, I expected problems with these lights, but ordered them anyway, hoping for the best. Reviewers seem to have had many quality-control issues with them. Either those problems were resolved, or I was extraordinarily lucky, becaue I'm very satisfied. All six lights worked, the illumination level is appropriate for night lights in a dark hallway (certainly not for reading, though), and they illuminate only when it is dark (e.g., late dusk). The offset, non-polarized, prongs are a good idea, offering more flexibility in placement. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peck

customer_reviews.title: Warm lights great for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Suuuuuuper bright. They’re supposed to automatically dim but they don’t. They provide way too much light for what we wanted out of a night light. We ended up having to put paper over them to dim them to a reasonable level. Wouldn’t buy again. Edit: after writing my initial review, the seller contacted me and sent me some “warm light” nightlights which work great! They are not too bright but provide enough light to see by. I am so impressed with Top Lite’s fantastic customer service. If you’re looking for a good nursery light with just enough light to see by but not so much to disturb sleep, go with the warm lights!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Goeltz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect illumination
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these night lights with Dusk-to-dawn sensor. They go on and off as expected. The amount of light given off is just right. A little more than your standard bulb night light but very diffused, a soft glow. We already have one in every room of the house, including the garage. We've had them close to a year and none of them have stopped working or dimmed. Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have a late night roamers in the house
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mother in law frequently gets up in the middle of the night and this provides just enough light to see where she’s going without having the whole house very bright. We have one also in our master bathroom because my husband is an early riser and the light isn’t so bright that it keeps me up. But it still enough light to not trip over anything and to see where you’re going
customer_reviews.author: BookLove

customer_reviews.title: Bright Night Lights - But Cool Light
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine got these and when I commented about them, told me they were from Amazon. Naturally, I did my own search and was sure I found the exact ones. I love how bright they are and how well the light sensors work, so that they only turn on when it gets dark. Unfortunately, I didn't realize that these were the cool light instead of warm light, so now I have a bunch of *really* bright night lights, which are good for some places but are just too bright for other spots.
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if the light sensor was better.
customer_reviews.text: Great LED night lights. I replaced the LED night lights I had bought from China before they were widely available. The soft yellowish light does not stimulate our brains before sleeping as much as the blue lights did. The only complaint I have is that the light sensors need almost direct light to stay off. I would still recommend this set to a friend. I hope you find this helpful. Here's the breakdown: PROS: -soft white LED lights -low power consumption 0.5W CONS: -light sensor is not sensitive enough to indoor lighting
customer_reviews.author: Euri

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I bought another set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Daylight models as they give more bright light which allows me to walk at night without turning on some lights. These look great too, allow space for another device in the wall outlet. Shipping was fast and price very good. I replaced my older LED Night Lights after getting these. I have a basement and use all through the house. Well built. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Duckwood

customer_reviews.title: Color difference between 2018 and 2020
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these lights twice, once in 2018 and once in 2020. There is a noticeable color difference between the two. In the photo, the top one is 2018 and the bottom one is 2020. They are both warm white but the 2020 one is significantly more yellow. Other than this, they work well and help light up dark spaces automatically without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and tasteful dark house safety fix
customer_reviews.text: These little things are perfect for creating a safe dim night light for the house! In a new house we really don't know the nooks and crannies of what we might bump into in the dark yet. The fact that these guys use so little power is a plus and they really turn an overall scary dark house into a safe glow at night for my little ones or anyone else needing a snack/drink/tuck in. I always go for the the warm white, (personal preference). They don't block the other outlet when turned the right way, are very light weight, and give a little simple modern design. The price is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cool white version of these. These are great. I put one in each room and can navigate the apartment at night without touching a single light. I used to leave a lamp on a timer for the cat in case I was put past dark [not that the cat either cared or was even bothered by the dark but it made me feel better] but now these illuminate the apartment after dark just fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eric King Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bright...almost too bright
customer_reviews.text: These lights put out a fair amount of lumens...for me they're actually a hair too bright for certain situations. They consume 0.5W, so I think ideally, I would like to see a version that is 0.3W...that would be perfect for me. the light sensor works really well too. I bought two 6-packs and spread the lights around the house. 2 out of the 12 inexplicably didnt work out of the box, but after contacting the company...they sent me replacements. Customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T

customer_reviews.title: only one problem is... me
customer_reviews.text: About Quality and function, I have no complaint. It turns on off depends on the surrounding area's brightness that works nicely. When turn off the light it instantly light up. The problem I have is, I am wearing glasses so naturally I don't put it when I go to bathroom in the night. Then my blur vision makes it like an eye in the darkness. It's kida creepy, actually scars me. So I bought different design lamp for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: ChihayaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good night lights
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lights for when you need to see in the dark, but not so bright that they bother me when I get up in the middle of the night. I'm especially impressed with the dusk to dawn sensor. I replaced my old incandescent night-lights with these, and several of them that used to stay on almost all day (burning through bulbs at a ridiculous fast rate) no longer do because the sensor on these is more sensitive to light. Plus, if they did stay on all day, they take less power, and cost less money to run. Very nice product - I would buy again if I have need.
customer_reviews.author: NPH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of light!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are perfect for our long dark basement halls. We used to have to turn on 5 different lights to go from out room to the kitchen or living room. We placed these in hallways and stairwells and don’t have to touch the lights anymore in the night! It’s even enough light to grab a midnight snack or carry a cranky baby to a rocking chair. We also keep our bedroom door open and the plug in the hall provides enough light for me to do midnight feedings for my new baby without using a bright harsher light! Definitely would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night lights with light sensor. True warm white light.
customer_reviews.text: I got a set of these in the warm white and these are great. Nice and bright true warm light. They have a light sensor so once you switch off the room/hallway lights and it is dark, they switch on. There are no street lights where we live, so once the lights are out, it is pitch dark dark and find ourselves stumbling over to get to the light switches. We don't always want to switch on the hallway lights (8 bulbs switch on at the same time) or the big chandelier in the foyer (9 bulbs). So these LED night lights are great. I will buy another set or two.
customer_reviews.author: riasupermomma

customer_reviews.title: Useful as a nightlight for general lighting
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. They are bright, but don't cast a lot of light. The light just goes all over instead of being a little more focused. Ok, I'm editing my review because the seller contacted me multiple times and explained that these lights are not designed as a focused light, they are meant for a hallway or area that would be dark and could use dispersed light. They also refunded half of my purchase, but just based on the effort they made to reach out and explain their product to me merits five stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Baker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Night Lights and Amazing Customer Service! Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These night lights are awesome! They provide the perfect amount of light and have a very good light sensor. They don't hog the outlet either which is a huge plus. The warm white light is perfect for keeping things cozy as daylight white can be a little harsh on the eyes at night. To top everything off, Sycees customer service is second to none, I ran into an issue with one night light and they went above and beyond to make things right (Thanks Ivy!). If you're looking for quality night lights, you found them!
customer_reviews.author: Conrad R.

product_meta.title: Sycees Plug-in LED Night Light with Dusk-to-Dawn Sensor for Bedroom, Bathroom, Kitchen, Hallway, Stairs, Daylight White, 6-Pack
feature_bullets: Bright enough to see where you're going in the dark without turning on other lights, but not so bright as to blind you
Built-in smart light sensor, the nightlight automatically lights up only when the room is dark enough
Offset plugs and compact size, the nightlight does not block the second outlet
Costs you less than $0.20 per year to operate (based on 11 cents/kWh), and no bulbs to replace with long life LEDs
Perfect for hallway, kitchen, stairs, living room, bathroom, bedroom, nursery, anywhere you need a guiding light

specifications.Special Features: Auto On/Off, Energy Efficient, Soft Glow, Offset Plugs, Compact Size
specifications.Usage: Hallway, Kitchen, Stairs, Living Room, Bathroom, Bedroom, Nursery
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars10,446 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
